sentence: The wildlife diversity was not as expected and the currents were often very rough
While I did experience and issue with my spa services when I brought it to the spa teams attention they made it a priority to establish an acceptable resolution
When we arrived there were no available 3 water bungalows that were adjacent so they just upgraded our 2 bungalows to be adjacent to the 3rd water bungalow with pool
We can not think of a single fault for this hotel and look forward to returning soon
Part of the reason might have been due to it being the 50th anniversary of the Maldives and a number of the guests were government guests and therefore not the average holiday maker
This experience fell a bit short of that but overall it is still a relaxing stay

We stayed with our two teenage boys in a two bedroom beach villa and the reason I can not say that this was perfection is the two bedroom villas only have a small second bedroom and only one house bathroom with one shower
I never realized that it was our 9th stay at Kuda Hura
We arrived very late and hot congee was waiting in room as a light snack before bedtime
Not a big deal because the beach was mostly empty
From the top Management to the bell boy have been extremely kind and hospitable
Knowledge biologists provide contextual information and then act as guides on the activity which was most beneficial
We thoroughly enjoyed our stay there the staffs are amongst the most friendliest and helpful staffs we have ever encountered in any luxury hotels
Special thanks to the diving team Moose and Shawn and VERY special thanks to Zahir for his knowledgeable conditioning he is a great fitness coach
Amazing spa located on a separate island and over water astonishing rooms
Would definitely recommend the resort for the staff and their quick response time
His personal touch amongst guests is highly commendable
My mother would like to give special thanks to the executive chef Vincent Tan for his amazing culinary skills and kindness
This hotel was absolutely beautiful really a one of a kind experience
Dian and Sebastian along with Branka keep the Reef grill going ably assisted by Zaidhy
